product.name: Maybelline Eye Studio Color Tattoo 24HR Cream Gel Shadow
product.description:
Dare to wear 24HR shadow!Maybelline's Color Tattoo Cream Gel Shadow uses ink technology for their most intense, long-lasting colour saturation. The cream formula glides on without creasing and keeps colour vibrant.Ophthalmologist-tested. Safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
                    
                    
                    
                        
                        For best results: With 
fingertips, sweep all over eye from inner corner and work outwards. For
 added drama, darken as desired.
